member this.KeyTip : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且不得包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 按鍵提示有時也稱為存取金鑰或加速器，用來作為啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按鍵提示會出現在當您按 ALT 鍵。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定父代上控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷類別。It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTipDescription : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示中的描述性文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.

value.span: 要顯示在工具提示中的描述性文字。

span.span: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果設定屬性，則不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示; 將改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
